Title: not worth it
Content: i bought this from viviana mall thane decathlon store after 2 week the strap velcro getting loose
Brand Response: Hello R, We’re really sorry to hear that you’re experiencing issues with the weight training wrist straps after just two weeks of use. We understand how frustrating it can be when a product doesn’t perform as expected, especially with something that is designed for support during your workouts.  Could you please share more details about how the strap is loosening? Is it not staying secure during use, or is the velcro itself wearing out? Your feedback will help us assess the quality and durability of this product and make necessary improvements.  We take product quality very seriously, and your experience will be reviewed to ensure we provide better, more reliable products in the future. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, and we hope to resolve the issue in a way that works for you.  We truly appreciate you sharing your thoughts, and we’re committed to offering you a better experience moving forward.  Sportingly, Sagar Gocher Sports ambassador Running United

Title: N/A
Content: Not at all great , it’s so stiff that you can’t perform any activity after earring this
Brand Response: Hello Anuj, Thank you for sharing your feedback on the weight training wrist straps. We're sorry to hear that you found them stiff and uncomfortable for activity. We understand how important it is for accessories like these to be flexible and supportive during your workouts.  These wrist straps are designed to provide extra support for your wrists during weight training, and they are adjustable to fit your needs. While they are meant to be firm for stability, we understand that the stiffness might not be ideal for everyone. If the fit feels off, we recommend adjusting the straps to ensure a more comfortable and secure fit.  We truly appreciate your feedback, as it helps us improve the design and comfort of our products. Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we hope that with the right adjustments, you’ll find the wrist straps more suited to your workouts in the future.  If you need any further assistance or tips on using them, feel free to reach out.  Sportingly, Sagar Gocher Sports ambassador Running United

Title: Satisfait de l'article
Content: Le rapport qualité prix de cet article est vraiment bon. Pour une dizaine d'euros, il est compliqué d'avoir un article plus efficace.  Malheureusement, il comporte plusieurs défauts. La bande n'est pas assez longue et il faut donc la serrer très vite pour avoir un bon maintient ce qui n'est pas agréable (irritations et une fois mise, ce n'est pas forcément agréable). Aussi, le scratch a pu se détacher pendant un squat ou un développé couché  Globalement pour le prix, cet article est très bon, avec un rapport qualité prix très bon. Seulement le fait que les bandes soient si abordables nous oblige à faire des compromis sur la qualité.
